title: If corki was a pokemon
body:
[](http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/9/98/Corki_OriginalLoading.jpg/revision/20160524002105)
he would be a Rotom-F
http://31.media.tumblr.com/610e1b88cde3610cfb1bfe28386ce50b/tumblr_n8x7b84kCI1qk7puko2_r1_500.gif
Rotom-F is the closest thing to a helicopter I could find.
